title: inru varuvAnO
sahitya:
inru varuvAnO nALaiyO? ennEramum avan vazhi nOkki ninrEn


anupallavi

 kanrugaL mEittiDa kAnagam Egumun senru varEn enru seppiya sol ninaindE


caraNam   tenral ennait-toTTu tazhuviDinum kunrininrum kuyilOsai kETTiDinum
cintai azhikkum avan kannal mozhiyum kuzhalOsai amudum tuLLu naDaiyum
ninaindEngum endan kaN poTri aNaindu kala kalavena naghai olittiDa 
tandEn aruL inrE enru tan oLi pozhi mukham kATTiDa
